Select Help

Shortcut: W

Quick Shortcut: B

The select tool allows you to box select vertices.

Note: This tool is very basic at the moment.

Selecting

LMB+Drag : box select vertices
Ctrl+LMB+Drag : remove vertices from selection
Shift+LMB+Drag : add vertices to selection

General

G : grab and move selected geometry
R : rotate selected geometry
S : scale selected geometry
Backspace, Delete, X : delete/dissolve/collapse selected
V : rip selected edge
Alt+V : rip and fill selected edge

Hosted on GitHub Pages. Theme by orderedlist
